subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In a homecoming of sorts, Jeremy Lin scored 17 points and went 3 for 4 from the 3-point line to help the Rockets overcome the Indiana Pacers in an exhibition game in Taiwan.
snippet: In a homecoming of sorts, Jeremy Lin scored 17 points and went 3 for 4 from the 3-point line to help the Rockets overcome the Indiana Pacers in an exhibition game in Taiwan.
